topic.title: PT9.1.05 Using the Tasks Table in Assignments and Progress

body.p: The Tasks Table is a great place to make bulk assignments. Here, it is possible to assign a task across all the selected books or to assign an entire stage or book to a single person.

p.b: Assign tasks across books in the Tasks Table

ul.li: Click the Blue Assignments and Progress button
Use the verses filter to select books

p.b: Assign a task to selected books to the same person

ul.li: Below the task, click Assign tasks

body.p: Incomplete [XMLmind] can be reassigned but not completed chapters.

ul.li: A warning message will appear with options to overwrite all assignments or only those chapters that have not yet been assigned.

p.b: Assign an entire stage to one person

ul.li: Click the Assign stage button (at the top of each stage).
Change assignments for certain tasks as needed.

body.p: Once you have completed the bulk assignment process you can fine-tune the assignments in the All Task view.
